title: SC EP:61 Government Coverup
itunes:title: SC EP:61 Government Coverup
description: Tonight we speak with a ex-police officer who was investigating a Sasquatch encounter on a property and was told to back off of his investigation. When he refused, he was forced out of the police force. Join us for a crazy night, you will not want to miss this government cover-up. Why is the government covering up Sasquatch? Tonight we will give you some insight...
